attributes.action: allow pupils to formally review and rate their teachers performance each year as an annual review to help raise standards in education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many good teachers but there are many ineffective teachers in the education system. Just as pupils are judged on their standards, teachers too should be assessed by the pupils, and this should be looked at by the education authority every year. This can be done by a form, laid out with certain questions. We always remember the good teachers, but we also remember the bad ones. These experiences carry forward into adulthood.
